subject: Soccer
Books and Literature
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: “Pelé: Edson Arantes do Nascimento” is a tribute to Pelé, and how better to celebrate the man at 66 than with a silk-swaddled tome of 720 pages that weighs 35 pounds?
